org.fujion.plotly.layout

Class GeoOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fujion.ancillary.Options
      • org.fujion.plotly.layout.GeoOptions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionMap.IOptionMapConverter, IClientTransform

    public class GeoOptions
extends Options
    Layout options for geo.

    • Field Detail

      • bgcolor

        @Option
public String bgcolor
        The background color of the map.

        Default: "#444"

      • center_lat

        @Option(value="center.lat")
public Double center_lat
        The latitude of the map's center. For all projection types, the map's latitude center lies at the middle of the latitude range by default.

      • center_lon

        @Option(value="center.lon")
public Double center_lon
        The longitude of the map's center. By default, the map's longitude center lies at the middle of the longitude range for scoped projection and above "projection.rotation.lon" otherwise.

      • coastlinecolor

        @Option
public String coastlinecolor
        The coastline color.

        Default: "#444"

      • coastlinewidth

        @Option
public Integer coastlinewidth
        The coastline stroke width (in px).

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • countrycolor

        @Option
public String countrycolor
        The country boundary line color.

        Default: "#444"

      • countrywidth

        @Option
public Integer countrywidth
        The stroke width (in px) of country boundaries.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • domain_x

        @Option(value="domain.x")
public int[] domain_x
        The horizontal domain of the geo subplot (in plot fraction). Note that geo subplots are constrained by domain. In general, when "projection.scale" is set to 1, a map will fit either its x or y domain, but not both.

        Default: [0,1]

      • domain_y

        @Option(value="domain.y")
public int[] domain_y
        The vertical domain of the geo subplot (in plot fraction). Note that geo subplots are constrained by domain. In general, when "projection.scale" is set to 1, a map will fit either its x or y domain, but not both.

        Default: [0,1]

      • framecolor

        @Option
public String framecolor
        The frame color.

        Default: "#444"

      • framewidth

        @Option
public Integer framewidth
        The stroke width (in px) of the frame.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • lakecolor

        @Option
public String lakecolor
        The lake color.

        Default: "#3399FF"

      • landcolor

        @Option
public String landcolor
        The land mass color.

        Default: "#F0DC82"

      • lataxis

        @Option
public final LonLatAxisOptions lataxis
        Options for latitude axis.

      • lonaxis

        @Option
public final LonLatAxisOptions lonaxis
        Options for longitude axis.

      • oceancolor

        @Option
public String oceancolor
        The ocean color.

        Default: "#3399FF"

      • projection

        @Option
public final ProjectionOptions projection
        Projection options.

      • resolution

        @Option
public GeoOptions.ResolutionEnum resolution
        The resolution of the base layers. LOW corresponds to 110 km/mm, HIGH to 50 km/mm.

      • rivercolor

        @Option
public String rivercolor
        The river color.

        Default: "#3399FF"

      • riverwidth

        @Option
public Integer riverwidth
        The stroke width (in px) of the rivers.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1

      • scope

        @Option
public GeoOptions.ScopeEnum scope
        The scope of the map.

        Default: WORLD

      • showcoastlines

        @Option
public Boolean showcoastlines
        Determines whether or not the coastlines are drawn.

      • showcountries

        @Option
public Boolean showcountries
        Determines whether or not country boundaries are drawn.

      • showframe

        @Option
public Boolean showframe
        Determines whether or not a frame is drawn around the map.

      • showlakes

        @Option
public Boolean showlakes
        Determines whether or not lakes are filled in color.

      • showland

        @Option
public Boolean showland
        Determines whether or not land masses are filled in color.

      • showocean

        @Option
public Boolean showocean
        Determines whether or not oceans are filled in color.

      • showrivers

        @Option
public Boolean showrivers
        Determines whether or not rivers are filled in color.

      • showsubunits

        @Option
public Boolean showsubunits
        Determines whether or not boundaries of subunits within countries (e.g. states, provinces) are drawn.

      • subunitcolor

        @Option
public String subunitcolor
        The color of the subunits boundaries.

        Default: "#444"

      • subunitwidth

        @Option
public Integer subunitwidth
        The stroke width (in px) of the subunits boundaries.

        Constraints: ≥0

        Default: 1
